The Facts

The Palm Beach sale was documented in the Post article, and Trump’s numbers are close.
But there is other evidence that shows a continuing interest in doing deals not only with Russian real estate buyers, but deals in Russia.
In a 2008 speech, Trump’s son, Donald Jr., made it clear that the Trumps want to do business in Russia, but were finding it difficult.
In 2005, Trump signed a one-year deal with a New York development company to explore a Trump Tower in Moscow, but the effort fizzled.
